job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* AI-Augmented Customer Resolutions: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short, and then close the gap by improving the AI system
     * AI Training and Improvement: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
     * Cutting-Edge AI Integration: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Taking two whole months to get up to speed; you will be expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
     * Relying on your managers for help; if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role, * Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve
job_details.full_text:
Application Support Engineer, Trilogy (Remote) - $60,000/year USD

* AI-Augmented Customer Resolutions: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short, and then close the gap by improving the AI system
     * AI Training and Improvement: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
     * Cutting-Edge AI Integration: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Taking two whole months to get up to speed; you will be expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
     * Relying on your managers for help; if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role, * Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on using and improving existing AI systems for customer support rather than developing or engineering AI models. While there's mention of 'AI Training and Improvement' and 'fine-tuning sessions', the core responsibilities revolve around analyzing tickets and providing feedback, which leans more towards AI utilization than core AI engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to the process of adapting or refining existing AI models, which falls under the 'Modeling' category.

job_tasks.phrase: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
job_tasks.justification: Prototyping and testing new tools, even if AI-related, involves software development practices to evaluate their potential integration and functionality.

job_tasks.phrase: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short
job_tasks.justification: This involves understanding the customer issues (business context) and identifying where the AI system's capabilities are insufficient, requiring an understanding of the business problem being solved.

job_tasks.phrase: Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the need to understand the customer support domain and how AI can be integrated to solve business problems, aligning with business understanding.

soft_skills.phrase: apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short
soft_skills.justification: This requires analyzing the limitations of the AI and applying human problem-solving skills to address them.
This directly points to the ability to independently solve problems and overcome obstacles without constant supervision.

soft_skills.phrase: ramp up one several products within the first month
soft_skills.justification: This indicates a need for rapid learning and adaptation to new products and systems.
Taking initiative to improve the AI system suggests ownership and a proactive, innovative approach.
Providing detailed feedback on AI performance implies taking ownership of the quality and effectiveness of the AI's output.
